mapper.insert: insert into t_sysmgr_advertisement_config (id, ad_code, source_code, is_use,remark,ad_name) values (#{id}, #{adCode}, #{sourceCode}, #{isUse},#{remark},#{adName})
mapper.update: update t_sysmgr_advertisement_config set ad_code = #{adCode}, source_code = #{sourceCode}, is_use = #{isUse}, remark=#{remark}, ad_name=#{adName} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, ad_code, source_code,is_use,remark,ad_name from t_sysmgr_advertisement_config where id = #{id}
select id, ad_code, source_code,is_use,remark,ad_name from t_sysmgr_advertisement_config where ad_code = #{adCode}
select id, ad_code, source_code, is_use,remark,ad_name from t_sysmgr_advertisement_config

select id, ad_code, source_code, is_use,remark,ad_name from t_sysmgr_advertisement_config
AND ad_code LIKE "%"#{adCode}"%"
AND ad_name LIKE "%"#{adName}"%"
order by id desc
LIMIT #{start},#{limit}

select count(id) from t_sysmgr_advertisement_config
AND ad_code LIKE "%"#{adCode}"%"
AND ad_name LIKE "%"#{adName}"%"
